46 using namespace std;

48 namespace Tapi

50 // Constructor/Destructor
51 
52 Subscriber::Subscriber(ros::NodeHandle* nh, string nodename)
53  : TapiClient(nh, nodename, SUBSCRIBER_DEVICE), nh(nh), nodename(nodename)
54 {
55  configSub = nh->subscribe("/Tapi/Config", 1000, &Subscriber::readConfigMsg, this);
56 }
57 
58 Subscriber::~Subscriber()
59 {
60  configSub.shutdown();
61  for (int i = 0; i < subscribers.size(); i++)
62  {
63  subscribers[i].second->shutdown();
64  delete subscribers[i].second;
65  subscribers[i].second = 0;
66  delete coefficients[i];
67  }
68 }
69 
70 // Public member functions
71 
72 double* Subscriber::AddFeature(ros::SubscribeOptions opt, string featurename)
73 {
74  // Create empty options for this topic
75  string noTopic = "";
76  topicNames.push_back(noTopic);
77  double* dblptr = 0;
78  ros::Subscriber* subscriber = 0;
79  pair<ros::SubscribeOptions, ros::Subscriber*> newEntry;
80  newEntry = make_pair(opt, subscriber);
81  subscribers.push_back(newEntry);
82 
83  // Generate a feature message for the featureMsgs vector of Tapi::TapiClient, save it and give the user a pointerto
84  // the coefficient
85  tapi_lib::Feature feature;
86  string temp = opt.datatype;
87  feature.FeatureType = temp;
88  feature.Name = featurename;
89  feature.UUID = getNextFeatureUUID();
90  featureMsgs.push_back(feature);
91  dblptr = new double(1.0);
92  coefficients.push_back(dblptr);
93  connect();
94  return dblptr;
95 }
96 
97 // Private member functions
98 
99 void Subscriber::readConfigMsg(const tapi_lib::Connection::ConstPtr& msg)
100 {
101  // Iterate through all of our features to check if this Config message contains a uuid of us
102  for (int i = 0; i < featureMsgs.size(); i++)
103  {
104  if (msg->SubscriberUUID == uuid && msg->SubscriberFeatureUUID == featureMsgs[i].UUID)
105  {
106  // Message is for us. Now check if we shall disconnect
107  if (msg->PublisherUUID == "0" || msg->PublisherFeatureUUID == "0")
108  if (subscribers[i].second)
109  {
110  subscribers[i].second->shutdown();
111  delete subscribers[i].second;
112  subscribers[i].second = 0;
113  }
114  else
115  ;
116  // Or we shall connect
117  else
118  {
119  // Check if there currently is a connection and if it's the same as we shall connect. Because only if we change
120  // the connection we need to stop the old service and start/create the new one
121  if (topicNames[i] != "/Tapi/" + msg->PublisherUUID + "/" + msg->PublisherFeatureUUID ||
122  subscribers[i].second == 0)
123  {
124  topicNames[i] = "/Tapi/" + msg->PublisherUUID + "/" + msg->PublisherFeatureUUID;
125  subscribers[i].first.topic = topicNames[i];
126  if (subscribers[i].second)
127  {
128  subscribers[i].second->shutdown();
129  delete subscribers[i].second;
130  subscribers[i].second = 0;
131  }
132  subscribers[i].second = new ros::Subscriber(nh->subscribe(subscribers[i].first));
133  }
134  *coefficients[i] = msg->Coefficient;
135  }
136  }
137  }
138 }
139 }
